import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import MetaTags from "react-meta-tags"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { BreadcrumbsItem } from "react-breadcrumbs-dynamic"; import Tab from "react-bootstrap/Tab"; import Nav from "react-bootstrap/Nav"; import LayoutOne from "../../layouts/LayoutOne"; import Breadcrumb from "../../wrappers/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import {updatePassword,updateUserId,login} from '../../redux/actions/loginActions' const LoginRegister = ({ location,login,userID,password,updateUserID,updateUserPass }) => { const { pathname } = location; console.log(userID) return ( Flone | Login Home Login Register {/* breadcrumb */}

Login

updateUserID(newValue)} />
Forgot Password?
); }; LoginRegister.propTypes = { location: PropTypes.object }; const mapStateToProps=(state)=> { console.log(state); return { userID:state.loginData.curUserId, password:state.loginData.curPassword }; } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { login: (username, pass) => { this.props.push('/'); }, updateUserID:(username)=>{ dispatch(updateUserId(username)) }, updateUserPass:(password)=>{ dispatch(updatePassword) } }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(LoginRegister);
